sentences.sContent: Another cognate cause of crime of violence was the family tyranny.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another cognate cause of crime of violence was the family tyranny.
sentences.sCn: 导致凶暴的犯罪行为的另一个同类的原因是家庭内的专制主义。

sentences.sContent: The characters at the same Character's family are belonging to this family's differentiation, we call it" the cognate character" for short.
sentences.sContent_eng: The characters at the same Character's family are belonging to this family's differentiation, we call it" the cognate character" for short.
sentences.sCn: 处于同一字族的汉字都属于这个字族的“同族孳乳字”或“同族分化字”，简称“同族字”。

remMethod.val: cogn (认识) + ate → 认识的 → 同类的

trans.tranOther: cognate words or languages have the same origin
